Besedo

uporabljamo pred samostalniki, kadar želimo poudariti določen kraj ali čas.

seg.quote: I walked up to the very top.
We were there from the very beginning.

sense.def:
Besedo
very
uporabljamo pred samostalniki tudi takrat, ko želimo poudariti, da je nekaj ravno pravo ali popolnoma tako kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: The very man I've been looking for!
Those are the very words he used.

sense.def:
Izraz
very much so
je poudarjena različica pritrdilnice
yes
.

seg.quote: ‘Did your father resist this?’—‘Very much so.’
‘Mr Brown wants to see you.’—‘Very well. I'll be along in a moment.’
